name: The Gun Dungeon SNES
description:
I made this game in 7 days for the retro game jam - THIS IS MY FIRST EVER GAME so pls don't hate it too harshly (I still want feedback though, good or bad)

Collect guns, soot bullets, beat the boss. there are several guns with ups and downs (side effects) scattered across the map, find the best one to use against the boss.

I Would love to see this game speedrunned, that would be cool

CONTROLS

WASD - move

CTR/SHIFT - roll

MOUSE - aim and shoot
